name: Steam Punch
description:
THE GAME

Steam Punch is a 2.5D Action Tower Defense game where you control a Steampunk Armor to protect the enemies from invading the mansion.

THE STORY

In a city consumed by a dense fog of pollution generated by the machines in the industry, a notorious inventor is creating two Steampunk Armors that together would heal the city, but they could only be used by their sons Enzo and Valentina. Knowing that this cure would end his profits, an envious Apothecary plans to shows up to kill the inventor and steal the cure for him.

To settle the things, in Steam Punch, you play as Enzo, a boy who controls the only Steampunk armor completed in order to protect his sister and his father from the evil-minded Apothecary's bandits.

THE TEAM

The game was developed by the students of Senac's Game Development Post Graduation and was presented in Senac's stand in Comic Con Experience 2018.

  • Game Designer, Level Designer and UI Art - Leonardo Bazana
  • Lead Programmer, Animator and Concept Art - Alan Pereira
  • Programmers - Bruno Cezar Souza, Daniel Castilho, Vinicius Alberto Souza
  • 3D Artists - Alan Pereira, Bruno Cezar Souza, Daniel Castilho, Vinicius Alberto Souza
  • Sound Design - Daniel Castilho
